At  [0-1], the video shows a person interacting with a large LED screen displaying various app icons. The person appears to be removing a panel from the screen. This is the first instance of a panel being removed. There is no indication of any prior removals in this segment. The dense caption confirms the presence of the screen and the app icons, but the key action here is the removal of the panel. Since this is the first segment, there are no prior actions to compare with. The question asks how many times the person removes a panel over the course of the video, and based on this segment alone, only one panel has been removed. <answer>A</answer>

This action confirms that the person has removed two panels so far. The dense caption supports this by describing the removal and installation process. Given the options, Option D (The person removes two panels from the LED screen.) aligns with the observed actions in the current segment.
